data.title: ON THE WATERFRONT IN CONCERT
data.meta_description: Welcome to On the Waterfront in Concert's page at IMG Artists. Visit for more information, video, photos, contacts and more.
data.meta_site_name: IMG ARTISTS - The World is Our Stage
data.text:
Experience a thrilling new presentation of this iconic film and winner of 8 Academy Awards® , including Best Picture. The orchestra plays Leonard Bernstein’s electrifying score live, while the newly re-mastered film is shown in glorious high definition on the big screen with the original dialog intact.

This classic romantic tragedy, directed by Elia Kazan with screenplay by Budd Schulberg, Produced by Sam Spiegel, and starring Marlon Brando, Karl Malden, Lee J. Cobb, Rod Steiger, Pat Henning and Eva Marie Saint, in her first film role, is one of the greatest achievements in the history of movie-making.

CAST

Marlon Brando – Terry Malloy

Karl Malden – Father Pete Barry

Lee J. Cobb – Michael J. Skelly aka “Johnny Friendly”

Rod Steiger – Charley “the Gent” Malloy

Eva Marie Saint – Edie Doyle

Pat Henning – Timothy J. “Kayo” Dugan

John F. Hamilton – “Pop” Doyle

Ben Wagner – Joey Doyle

James Westerfield – Big Mac

Fred Gwynne – Mladen “Slim” Sekulovich (uncredited)

Tami Mauriello – Tillio

Tony Galento – Truck

Directed by Elia Kazan
